receipts.slo_violation_reason: File lock contention during dependency compilation
receipts.output:
[cargo-make] INFO - cargo make 0.37.24
[cargo-make] INFO - Build Done in 48.56 seconds.
receipts.notes: Blocked waiting for file lock on build directory. Completed successfully but exceeded 5s SLO by 43.56s (871% over budget).

receipts.slo_violation_reason: Timeout after 150s waiting for file locks
receipts.output:
[cargo-make] INFO - Execute Command: "timeout" "150s" "cargo" "test" "--workspace" "--lib"
Blocking waiting for file lock on package cache
Blocking waiting for file lock on build directory
Error while executing command, exit code: 124
receipts.notes: Command timed out at 150s. Blocked on package cache and build directory locks. SLO expects <10s for unit tests.

receipts.slo_violation_reason: Shell script configuration error: pipefail option not supported in default shell
receipts.output:
/tmp/fsio_TLSjIcD0MU.sh: 4: set: Illegal option -o pipefail
Error while executing command, exit code: 2
receipts.notes: Makefile.toml lint task uses script_runner = '@shell' which defaults to /bin/sh, but script requires bash features (pipefail). Configuration defect in build system.

receipts.slo_violation_reason: Shell script configuration error: pipefail option not supported in default shell
receipts.output:
/tmp/fsio_CyjsaCkh5x.sh: 4: set: Illegal option -o pipefail
Error while executing command, exit code: 2
receipts.notes: Same configuration defect as lint task. Script requires bash but executes in /bin/sh.
Direct invocation bypassing cargo-make. Timed out at exactly 60s SLO threshold. Likely still blocked on locks.

slo_violations: cargo make check: 48.56s exceeds 5s SLO (871% over budget, +43.56s)
cargo make test-unit: TIMEOUT at 150s exceeds 10s SLO (1500% over budget)
cargo make lint: Configuration defect - shell script incompatibility
cargo make test: Configuration defect - shell script incompatibility

evidence_summary.primary_root_cause: File lock contention from concurrent cargo compilation processes
evidence_summary.secondary_root_cause: Makefile.toml configuration defect: script_runner='@shell' incompatible with bash scripts using pipefail

andon_signals.reason: Timeout waiting for file locks - task could not complete
andon_signals.action_required: Stop the line: investigate lock contention, sequential execution may be required
Fix Makefile.toml: change script_runner to '@duckscript' or use command='bash' with args
Fix Makefile.toml: same as lint task

andon_signals.reason: Completed successfully but severe SLO violation (871% over budget)
andon_signals.action_required: Investigate lock contention before proceeding to production

immediate_causes: Multiple concurrent cargo processes competing for file locks
Makefile.toml script_runner configuration using /bin/sh instead of bash
Long-running dependency compilation blocking test execution
contributing_factors: EPIC 9 parallel agent execution creating simultaneous build requests
First-time cargo-make installation requiring full dependency rebuild
No build artifact caching or pre-compilation strategy
systemic_issues: No build queue management for concurrent agents
SLOs not achievable during cold start or concurrent execution scenarios

recommendations.details: Replace 'script_runner = "@shell"' with 'command = "bash"' and 'args = ["-c", "..."]' for lint and test tasks to ensure bash features are available
recommendations.expected_impact: Enable lint and test commands to execute successfully

recommendations.details: Add mutex or sequential build phase before parallel agent execution to prevent file lock contention
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduce check time from 48.56s to target <5s, enable test-unit to complete <10s

recommendations.details: Document that SLOs apply to incremental builds, not cold starts. First build SLO should be <60s, incremental <5s.
recommendations.expected_impact: Align expectations with reality, prevent false SLO violations during initialization

recommendations.details: Run single 'cargo build' before spawning parallel agents to populate build cache
recommendations.expected_impact: All agents benefit from shared compiled dependencies, reduce overall cycle time

verdict_rationale: Two commands failed due to configuration defects
Two commands exceeded timeouts due to resource contention
One command marginally passed but violated SLO by 871%
No green receipts available - all signals are RED or YELLOW
System cannot be validated as deployment-ready in current state
next_steps: STOP THE LINE: Do not proceed with deployment
Implement build serialization or pre-compilation strategy (HIGH)
Re-run validation receipts after fixes applied
Only proceed when minimum 4/5 commands achieve GREEN status
